data.title: YouTube Vanced'Ä±, varsayÄ±lan uygulama olarak nasÄ±l ayarlarÄ±m?
data.description:
1. You need to have at least the [pico](https://github.com/opengapps/opengapps/wiki/Pico-Package) variant of GApps to run Vanced.

2. You canâ€™t run Vanced with microG Core without Google Play Services Framework which is available in all GApps packages and it's a required library.

3. If you are worried about your privacy & donâ€™t want to use GApps but still want to use watch YouTube without ads, then the [web version](https://youtube.com) is always available.

fields.content:
1. FarklÄ± Ã¼lkeye baÄŸlÄ± VPN kullanabilirsin.
2. [Web sitesini](https://youtube.com) kullanabilirsin.
3. MÃ¢lum, 480p kÄ±sÄ±tlamasÄ± sadece telefonlarÄ± etkilediÄŸinden, uygulamaya iÃ§erisinden cihazÄ±n marka ve model bilgisini deÄŸiÅŸtirerek, YouTube'un cihazÄ±nÄ± tablet gibi tanÄ±masÄ±nÄ±/gÃ¶rmesini saÄŸlayabilir ve kÄ±sÄ±tlamadan kurtulabilirsin.

#### Cihaz modeli nasÄ±l deÄŸiÅŸtirilir?

Yeniden baÅŸlattÄ±ktan sonra, 480p kÄ±sÄ±tlamasÄ± ortadan kalkmÄ±ÅŸ olmasÄ± gerekiyor.
